Github

Very basic rules/objective:
Place notes in your sequence and using your notes, try to convert all players to your color palette.
The game ends when all players have the same color palette.

Basic controls:
v : Toggle view between the whole game and your space.
space (with a ball in your space) : Add a note to your sequence.
1 or 2 (after breaking a ball) : Start a build phase or a fight phase.
w/a/s/d : Move (cannot move horizontally during a build phase).
h : Hide/unhide the cursor.
i : Hide/unhide these instructions.
m : Mute/unmute sound.
b : Start the game. Players cannot join the room after the game has started.

Refresh the page if you encounter errors or want to join a different room.
All players must leave a room for it to reset.
If players leave or disconnect from a room, they rejoin even if the game has already started.
